attributes.background: Brexit trade talks have been cancelled, for an undefined period, as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. If we are to have an organised departure from the EU, we need to postpone Brexit.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300412

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
